description.ruby-sapphire:
Recycles a used item for
one more use.
description.emerald:
Recycles a used item for
one more use.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A move that
recycles a used
item for use once
more.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user recycles a
single-use item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.
description.platinum:
The user recycles a
single-use item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user recycles a
held item that
has been used in
battle so it can be
used again.
description.black-white:
The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can be
used again.

The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can be
used again.

has been used in battle so it can be
used again.

The user recycles a held item that
has been used in battle so it can be
used again.
description.sun-moon:
The user recycles a held item that has been used in
battle so it can be used again.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user recycles a held item that has been used in

description.sword-shield:
The user recycles a held item that has been used in
battle so it can be used again.

effect.full:
User recovers the last item consumed by the user or a Pokémon in its position on the field.  The item must be used again before it can be recovered by this move again.  If the user is holding an item, this move fails.

Items taken or given away by covet, knock off, switcheroo, thief, or trick may not be recovered.
effect.shortEffect: User recovers the item it last used up.
